metadata.synopsis: Player wakes up in a dream field and meets Daisy for the first time. In the distance, a battle rages. Daisy gains our trust - they were the one to save us from the nautiloid and to avoid turning into mind flayers we need to do what they say - embrace the power growing inside of us.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Have a party of at least 2 playersQueue Campnight NIGHT_DaisyIntroEnd the Day and Go to Bed

9.text: I came just in time. You are transforming.
9.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Night. The player thrashes, feverish, clearly unwell. They're lying in a grassy field in the Astral Prison environment.

In the distance, we hear crackling sounds (lighting) and what could be interpreted as a scream. It's Orpheus screaming.

35.text: I came just in time. You are transforming.
35.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Night. The player thrashes, feverish, clearly unwell. They're lying in a grassy field in the Astral Prison environment.

In the distance, we hear crackling sounds (lighting) and what could be interpreted as a scream. It's Orpheus screaming.

36.text: I came just in time. You are transforming.
36.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Whisps of magic waft toward the player's face, calming their tadpole and the pain they feel. Their eyes open to see Daisy - in armour, powerful, angelic, battle-weary, casting some spell on the player's head

Daisy kneels down by our side, left foot forward, lift up a hand and cast healing spell. Player sits up in a start.

They are confused - are they hallucinating? We see their skin showing signs of illithid transformation.NodeContext: Alt: Hold still. You are transforming.

25.text: I know your voice. I've heard it before.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Quick cut of the Daisy freeing us form the TUT pod at start of game

16.text: I know your voice. I've heard it before.
16.context: NodeContext: Daisy kneeling left foot forward

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I know your voice. I've heard it before.
24.context: NodeContext: Daisy kneeling left foot forward

18.text: Yes, you have. I saved you before.
18.context: NodeContext: Daisy kneeling left foot forward

20.text: And I'm here to save you again.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Quick flash of not splatting into the beach during CRA

4.text: And I'm here to save you again.
4.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player's tadpole flairs up in another fit.

Daisy lift a palm over the player's forehead, holds it there a moment. A brief glow. The player is now completely well again.
NodeContext: Alt: Here, let me finish.

33.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player's tadpole flairs up in another fit.

Daisy lift a palm over the player's forehead, holds it there a moment. A brief glow. The player is now completely well again.
NodeContext: Alt: Here, let me finish.

3.text: You will not become a mind flayer. Not while I'm around. I'll protect you.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy stands, and extends a hand to help the player up.NodeContext: Daisy kneeling left foor forward

19.text: Imagine hacking the grabby paw off.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge starts to look like they're about to trance, but doesn't go any further, they are shocked to shake their head and snap back to reality

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Imagine hacking the grabby paw off.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge starts to look like they're about to trance, but doesn't go any further, they are shocked to shake their head and snap back to reality

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *Though the thought crosses your mind, it doesn't hold you, doesn't devour you, as your thoughts too often can.*
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge starts to look like they're about to trance, but doesn't go any further, they are shocked to shake their head and snap back to reality

2.text: Your compulsions will doom us all, if you do not work to stop them. I can help.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Take the hand offered to you.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

42.text: We haven't much time, so listen closely.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

0.text: We haven't much time, so listen closely.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

8.text: We haven't much time, so listen closely.
8.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Lighting cracks, it's close, the player's attention is pulled to a giant space skull with a globe of crystaline-like energy forming around it--like a bubble freezing in the winter.

A strange zolly move almost drags Daisy and the player's astal island closer to the skull: https://youtu.be/fP6QrESd7Fs

|The background changes. Plants wilt, the sky gets gets darker. We see glimpses of battle in the distance between angelic wisps and dark, armoured figures. The origin of the sounds we heard before become clear. It is lightning being thrown at the angelic creatures. The lightning deflects on them. They are casting a spell that is creating a magical globe around someone. The globe is not fully formed yet.|

26.text: We haven't much time, so listen closely.
26.context:

They are casting a spell that is creating a magical globe around someone. The globe is not fully formed yet.|

34.text: There is great potential within you. It comes from that parasite. Your instinct is to resist the power it gives, but you must accept it, nurture it.
34.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Lighting cracks, it's close, the player's attention is pulled to a giant space skull with a globe of crystaline-like energy forming around it--like a bubble freezing in the winter.

A strange zolly move almost drags Daisy and the player's astal island closer to the skull: https://youtu.be/fP6QrESd7Fs

|The background changes. Plants wilt, the sky gets gets darker. We see glimpses of battle in the distance between angelic wisps and dark, armoured figures. The origin of the sounds we heard before become clear. It is lightning being thrown at the angelic creatures. The lightning deflects on them. They are casting a spell that is creating a magical globe around someone. The globe is not fully formed yet.|

15.text: I will keep it from consuming you. But for the sake of both of us, you must learn to wield it.
15.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Lighting cracks, it's close, the player's attention is pulled to a giant space skull with a globe of crystaline-like energy forming around it--like a bubble freezing in the winter.

A strange zolly move almost drags Daisy and the player's astal island closer to the skull: https://youtu.be/fP6QrESd7Fs

|The background changes. Plants wilt, the sky gets gets darker. We see glimpses of battle in the distance between angelic wisps and dark, armoured figures. The origin of the sounds we heard before become clear. It is lightning being thrown at the angelic creatures. The lightning deflects on them. They are casting a spell that is creating a magical globe around someone. The globe is not fully formed yet.|

37.text: A fight for the fate of Faerûn. A fight we are losing. For now.
37.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Lighting cracks, it's close, the player's attention is pulled to a giant space skull with a globe of crystaline-like energy forming around it--like a bubble freezing in the winter.

A strange zolly move almost drags Daisy and the player's astal island closer to the skull: https://youtu.be/fP6QrESd7Fs

|The background changes. Plants wilt, the sky gets gets darker. We see glimpses of battle in the distance between angelic wisps and dark, armoured figures. The origin of the sounds we heard before become clear. It is lightning being thrown at the angelic creatures. The lightning deflects on them. They are casting a spell that is creating a magical globe around someone. The globe is not fully formed yet.|

39.text: A fight for the fate of Faerûn. A fight we are losing. For now.
39.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Daisy notices the player's growing alarm at the war in the background. 

Cut back over to the skull where angelic beings are locked in motal combat with dark armoured figures. Ideally this is backlt by the sphere forming. Lighting arcs across the opponents in the mid and background, one of the angelic figures steps into the foreground only to be struck down.NodeContext: Daisy and Player both facing the battle in front

12.text: You can change that, but only if you embrace your potential.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cut back to Daisy/Player with skull globe in background.NodeContext: Daisy looks to player on her right

27.text: I have to go. The enemy is closing in. I will be back.
27.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Kathoom! An arcane explosion! A chunk of crystaline enegy from the globe breaks of in a collision course for the player.

|In the background the dark figures unleash a barrage of lightning at the shield. It seems to break. The lightning splits and strikes some of the angel creatures. The tide of battle is turning. Daisy's attention is pulled away to this while they speak.|NodeContext: Alt: [intense] I have to go. The tide is changing.

17.text: Wake now. You'll feel better - I promise.
17.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Daisy gestures, floating the player off the ground, then astral pushes them back to the waking world!

|Daisy puts their hand over our heads again. While they speak, the dream world fades away. The player wakes in camp, dazed. The night sky is peaceful - no battle to be seen. |NodeContext: Alt: Wake now. I'll reach out when I can.

7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

41.speaker: Player
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player gets up on their own. Daisy retracts their hand with a smile.

22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player gets up on their own. Daisy retracts their hand with a smile.

28.speaker: Player
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player backs away from Daisy. Daisy retracts their hand with a smile.

30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player backs away from Daisy. Daisy retracts their hand with a smile.

38.text: Your salvation. And not for the first time. I saved you before.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: Back off. I have enough crawling around in my head already.

10.text: Combative - good. You'll need to be.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Are you the evil inside my brain? The dark compulsions?
